byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and MICHAEL D. SHEAR

abstract: Comments made by Donald Trump during town-hall-style event broadcast on Fox News in which he appears to have softened his stance on illegal immigration sparks confusion and anger across political spectrum; Trump is seeking to broaden his appeal, but any compromise on his previous stance is likely to anger base of conservative supporters, who were drawn to his candidacy based on his hard-line immigration policy.

headline.print_headline: Anger Is Broad as Trump Wavers on Deportations
headline.main: Donald Trump, Wavering on Immigration, Finds Anger in All Corners

snippet: After Mr. Trump indicated he might retreat from his vow to deport all immigrants in the United States illegally, disgust poured in from all sides, if for different reasons....
lead_paragraph: After Mr. Trump indicated he might retreat from his vow to deport all immigrants in the United States illegally, disgust poured in from all sides, if for different reasons.
